title: Enroll in Guest Loyalty Program
description: A new customer wants to enroll in the hotel's loyalty program.

tasks.description: Explain the benefits of the loyalty program (e.g., points, free nights, upgrades).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the program's value proposition.

tasks.description: Collect the customer's personal information to create a new loyalty profile.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all necessary details for enrollment.

tasks.description: Create the new loyalty account and provide the customer with their member number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the account and provides the member ID.
